org.resthub.web.validation

Class ValidationConstraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.resthub.web.validation.ValidationConstraint

  • public class ValidationConstraint
extends Object
    Object representation of validation constraints. Instances of this class can be easily serialized in JSON or XML format thanks to dedicated Jackson configuration.

    Sample JSON serialization: 

              "lastName": [{
              "type": "NotBlank",
              "message": "may not be empty"
          }],
          "email": [{
              "type": "NotNull",
              "message": "may not be null"
           }, {
              "type": "Email",
              "message": "not a well-formed email address",
              "flags": [],
              "regexp": ".*"
          }],


    Sample XML serialization: 

              < lastName>
              < type>NotBlank
              < message>may not be empty
          < /lastName>
          < email>
              < type>NotNull
              < message>may not be null
          < /email>
          < email>
              < type>Email
              < message>not a well-formed email address
              < regexp>.*
          < /email>

        Add attribute to the current constraint definition.
        Parameters:

        attribute - attribute value
        Returns:
        the previous value associated with attrKey, or null if there was no mapping for attrKey.
